item.title: When in doubt go to bed! <--- gleaned from Microcosmographia lv: The Discipline
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Microcosmographia lv: The Discipline <--- I'll never structure my day like this (or in any sort of regime inspired by or copied from monks even if it is from Anathem by Neal Stephenson which is one my favourites) but the sleep advice is obvious but great.

item.title: The Art of Command Line
item.description:
Pontifications

  • jlevy: The Art of Command Line is an amazing summary of command line capabilities. It mentions parallel and other fine commands but doesn't mention mlr aka miller.

item.title: Firefox Nightly is working great on Lenovo C630 Yogo ARM64 with Windows 10
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Firefox Nightly (ARM64 Windows 10 announcement) on ARM 64 Windows 10 is working great so far.
  • Have had a few issues with audio drivers but I'm not sure if that's a Firefox bug.

item.title: Accessing WSL files from File Explorer using \\wsl$\Ubuntu appears to be broken in ARM64 Windows 10 Builds on Windows 10 Build 1903
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Perhaps I should have stayed on the previous build :-) ?!!? \\wsl$\Ubuntu seems to work fine on my Surface Book 2 running the intel build 1903.
  • Haven't been able to find the same issue on github but P9 Explorer Integration not working #4027 appears closest although I have the P9 DLL and the correct P9 registry keys!

item.title: Hello world from Windows 10 ARM64 Lenovo C630 Yoga
recode is a handy linux command line utility to convert text with html escaped entites like & lt to <
item.description:
Pontifications

  • See recode github site! And a recode question on stack overflow where i learned the following incantation :-)
cat try2-2116-27may2019-test-api-stdout.txt | \
recode html..ascii  > try2-2116-27may2019-test-api-stdout.html

item.title: Maybe Fido is delaying Samsung Note 8 Updates not Samsung (since Note 8 is on the list of phones that get a monthly update and the Samsung S10 got an update already)?
item.description:
Pontifications

  • See Volker Weber's May Android Updates :: Samsung wins again which shows the S10 got its May update already and
  • sammobile: When will my Galaxy phone get a security update? <--- shows the Note 8 on the same update schedule as the S10
  • Previously: S*msung Note 8 on F*do received the Google April Security Patch on May 11, 2019

item.title: Interplanetary Gatsby: The Complete Beginner's Guide to Deploying Your First Static Website to IPFS: another cool thing I should try!
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Interplanetary Gatsby: The Complete Beginner's Guide to Deploying Your First Static Website to IPFS
  • Gotta try it!

item.title: Make a tshirt or sticker or some such swag from the thumbnails of a pdf of bugzilla text contributions (e.g. new bugs, comments, metadata changes) or kitsune text contributions (e.g. SUMO KB article edits)
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Inspired by my previous post from April 21, 2019 : Idea: make a tshirt with the m*eller report r*dacted with 50% of the thumbnails on front and 50% on back and call it of course 'mrstardacted'
  • Text thumbnails of open source contributions as art for the win :-) (I'd make my thumbnails pink on white instead of black on white naturally or maybe even white on pink)
